title: 2018 Sudan Premier League
text:
The 2018 <a href="Sudan%20Premier%20League">Sudan Premier League</a> is the 47th season of top-tier <a href="association%20football">football</a> in <a href="Sudan">Sudan</a>. The season began on 3 February 2018.
First stage.
Group A.

<onlyinclude></onlyinclude>

<onlyinclude></onlyinclude>
Promotion/Relegation playoff.
First Legs [Oct 10]
Hilal Fasher 1-0 Ahli Khartoum 
Ahli W. Medani 2-1 Hilal Kaduqli 
Second Legs
[Oct 13]
Hilal Kaduqli 2-0 Ahli Wad Medani 
[Oct 14]
Ahli Khartoum 2-0 Hilal Al-Fasher
